    "name": "Final term in the rows of triangle A130457: a(n) = A130457(n, 3n), for n>=0.",
    "comment": [
        "Row n of triangle A130457 has 3n+1 terms, where row n+1 is generated by taking partial sums of row n and then appending 2 zeros followed by the final term in the partial sums of row n, for n>=0."
    ],
    "link": [
        "G. C. Greubel, <a href=\"/A130458/b130458.txt\">Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000</a>"
    ],
    "formula": [
        "a(n) = Sum_{k=1..n}((k*binomial(4*n-3*k-1,n-k))/(3*n-2*k)), n>0, a(0)=1. - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Jun 27 2016",
        "Recurrence: 3*(n-1)*(3*n - 4)*(3*n - 2)*(5491*n^4 - 57274*n^3 + 222641*n^2 - 382514*n + 245280)*a(n) = 8*(2*n - 5)*(4*n - 13)*(4*n - 11)*(5491*n^4 - 35310*n^3 + 83765*n^2 - 87090*n + 33624)*a(n-1) + 3*(n-1)*(3*n - 4)*(3*n - 2)*(5491*n^4 - 57274*n^3 + 222641*n^2 - 382514*n + 245280)*a(n-2) - (1553953*n^7 - 22978945*n^6 + 143006047*n^5 - 485316835*n^4 + 969747472*n^3 - 1141036300*n^2 + 732514848*n - 198216000)*a(n-3) + 8*(2*n - 5)*(4*n - 13)*(4*n - 11)*(5491*n^4 - 35310*n^3 + 83765*n^2 - 87090*n + 33624)*a(n-4). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jun 27 2016",
        "a(n) ~ 2^(8*n + 9/2) / (3025 * sqrt(Pi) * 3^(3*n - 3/2) * n^(3/2)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jun 27 2016"
    ],
